name: Slots 2018: free casino games and slot machines!

description:
A new way to play slots!
Welcome to NEW SLOTS 2020! Thousands of free spins and a huge starting bonus are awaiting you right now!

Dear players, we hasten to share the joy - NEW SLOTS 2020 Facebook page was created for you!
Wanna know our hot news first and get a lot of freebies, new friends, game tips and even more? Join our Facebook community on

https://www.facebook.com/New-Slots-2019-113013613410104/

★ An astonishing welcome bonus of 700,000 coins and great daily bonuses!
★ A new free slot machine every week!
★ Compete against other casino players online, or play casino slot games offline, if you wish to!
★ 100+ different casino slot machines free, almost like real ones, each with its own unique bonus games and special features!
★ Huge prizes for daily visitors of the game!
★ Collectable card sets which open secret free slots!
★ The huge number of casino slot game events won't let anyone get bored!
★ Stop every 2 hours to spin the wheel of luck absolutely for free!
★ You have a chance to open a new premium slot every 2 hours!
★ Some games offer so many free spins that your reels would seem to spin forever!
★ Win an additional prize each time you level up!
★ Classic Las Vegas 777 slots and modern slot machines combo in the same game!
★ Lots of interesting tasks and quests for each game!
★ For the luckiest slot machine players, there are DEADLY QUESTS and BOSS BATTLES - harder, more complicated quests!

Want to relax and have fun? Choose 777 slot machines from our latest new games 2019 that appeals to you and collect a HUGE WINNINGS from:
★ Wild Wild Slots,
★ Wheel of Maya,
★ Lucky Farm,
★ Scatter Kingdom,
★ Egyptian Gods,
★ Leprechaun’s Gold,
★ Pharaoh,
★ Zeus,
★ Buffalo
and many other free slots games.

Place bets without leaving your home - you don't need to risk real money to spin new 777 slots! Play free Vegas games with great hd graphics and win huge jackpots at home, at work, or in subway. You can even play free offline slots with bonus games, no wifi needed! There is a casino multiplayer to compete with others on the rating chart! Feel like you play real best Las Vegas slots casino games and double your winning with each spin!

Each casino game offers quests you can complete to gather sets of objects which yield better bonuses. Each collection has a unique prize. Try to collect them all playing casino slot machines and get even richer!

Payout from jackpot can be really big but it becomes available only to the luckiest players who have managed to amass enough money to enable jackpot mode. To receive the prize, you will get three jackpot reels at once. Try to get the key to the next reel and win all casino's money!

Compete against other players in casino multiplayer competition and fight for a truly deserved victory. The luckiest players go to the top of the ratings chart and receive even more additional huge prizes. Download NEW SLOTS 2020 and head the ratings chart of slot machine players!
You can play slots offline, with no need to be wifi connected during the game. Just download it once and enjoy lots of exciting offline casino slot games for players anywhere you want!

Don't forget to enter the game every two hours and collect your bonus which grows with every new level you reach! Also, get the huge daily free bonus which will let you play even if you have lost all of your funds. In addition, this app gives you an opportunity to receive free coins by watching ads - use this feature as much as you want!

NEW SLOTS 2020－free slot machines & casino games is not a gambling game. It does not have real money or any other material prizes. This game only mimics real slot machines action and does not guarantee success in a real casino or with real slots.
developers: Three wishes slot machines game studio
